website_summaries.verdict: Multiple shave speeds, helpful LED indicator lights, and a great selection of attachments sets this razor apart from other Philips models.
pros: We love the flexibility of the three shaving speeds, allowing users to control if they prefer a faster shave or a milder shave
The heads rotate in an impressive eight directions for extra closeness and comfort
LED indicators alert users to charge level, shaving head level, and travel lock engage
This model also includes a facial cleansing brush attachment and handy self-cleaning mode
cons: The plastic head covers must be removed for cleaning and tend to fall off with prolonged usage

customer_reviews.title: Unit not shipped as ordered! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer indicated, ans as I discovered after receiving my order, the cleaning station shipped with my razor was not the "smart clean pro" that was suppose to be included. Instead they shipped a cheaper unit that lacks the stage and status and progression of the cleaning function. It's frustrating that manufacturers are allowed to mislead consumers and I am expecting Amazon/Norelco to ship me the correct cleaning station. In the meantime you've been warned....what you see is not what you'll be getting!
customer_reviews.author: M. Beere

customer_reviews.title: Self Cleaning Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Self cleaning function doesn't really work. Drying function stopped working after a few months. Even though it is self cleaning you still need to take it apart and clean it. Super wasteful of cleaning fluid. There is a lot left after it says its out
customer_reviews.author: Adam Z.

customer_reviews.title: The picture shows there is a progress bar on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows there is a progress bar on the cleaning base and I checked other sources that there should be progress bar. However, the cleaning base I got does not have it. Fake item?
customer_reviews.author: Feng

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality razor
customer_reviews.text: Shaving quality not as good as panasonic linear blade which gives a much better close shave. However the noise level for this unit is less. However, there is a major quality issue: I have been noticing for the past 2 months one of the blades is slipping out of the lock every 2 to 3 days. I keep reinserting the blade and the locking yellow ring which lasts for 2 to 3 days. Unfortunately I was late by one day for service guarentee. This I think is a manufacturing quality issue that need replacement. However, it looks like I am stuck with this after spending $180. Will never buy a Phillips product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: im new to the electric shaver world and I wanted a smooth clean shave, and I was not disappointed by this shaver. easy to clean and easy to change blades. simple to use and comes with great travel case ( depends on purchase options). the one caveat is the replacement heads are expensive and must come from Philips Norelco. any thing purchased form aftermarket suppliers are knock offs and will not work... they will fit but will not work. I ordered a set of replacement blades from (here) and they correct number is sh90/62 and I got a box with no tool and when pulled of company stickers turned out to be a sh90/52 which are to big
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: NOT Returnable through Amazon even if broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas Present. Broken, plug won't fit base. Large and bulky, takes up too much counter space. Awkward set up for clicking razor in stand. Would happily exchange for a smaller, more user friendly unit that works. However, Amazon will NOT stand behind purchase. States item is not returnable do to health and safety standards. If an item is not returnable then it should state it very clearly in the item description! I have purchased many items for many years on Amazon. However, I will be much more selective about what I purchase from them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Close shave but frustratingly terrible design
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this razor for over a year now. While it does give a very close shave, especially with a shave lotion (hence the 2 star rating), the design for securing the blades is one of the worst I've ever seen. Inserting the retainer clips is such a frustrating endeavor that I often have to quit trying and just return to it later when I have more patience. Couple that with the fact that they often pop out while shaving resulting in a buzzing noise and an explosion of retainer clips and blades when you open the top to rinse it out after shaving. I can't recommend the razor for this reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: couchvsrun

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing, I inquired about some not receiving the SmartClean PRO cleaning system (with the cleaning progress bars) as advertised in the item description AND the pictures. EVERY response that I received, was YES, it did come with the SmartClean PRO cleaning system. Well....Mine did NOT! After spending an hour on the computer chat AND phone with Philips, they informed me that the cleaning system I received was the ONLY one they offer. No point in contacting Amazon, because all they will tell me to do is return the product and get a refund. I really like the razor itself, but was hoping to get the PRO cleaning system as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Best shave ever
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Philips shavers for the last 40 years. This is the very best shaving blade and head that they have produced and it provides such a smooth and close shave. I love it. Yes it is expensive, but when you use something every day on your face, your face will appreciate the fine quality and great shave. It is well worth the expense. The feature that allows you to choose from three different shaving speeds is outstanding, and deserves singling out. You will not regret the investment for this High Quality, Well Built, Shaver. I hope you enjoy shaving with it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Great razor, Expensive replacement blades
customer_reviews.text: Not going to reiterate what a great razor it is, like many I have used norelco razors for 20 plus years, plenty of others have stated so and I agree. Con: this is big $60 for replacement blades, when all other series are around $20-35. I can buy this razor refurb for $99. I can buy a brand new Norelco 4500 for the price of replacement blades. This is as bad as buying inkjet printer ink, seriously. Had I known I would have certainly bought a “lesser” razor.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good shave
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because I think it is over priced and the wash tank and required liquid is ridiculous. Just a money maker for mfr. The cutter head is no longer hinged to the base so it takes a bit of effort to reposition after washing when your hands shake a bit, I'm almost 80. It does shave closer than my older model even tho it has brand new heads and I like the % battery power remaining indicator. Another thing, the old model could be plugged in and you could shave while charging, this one not so. You have to build up enough charge and then continue to shave.
customer_reviews.author: joel serkes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this shaver
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this shaver. I have used Norelco shavers my entire life but this one is junk The self clean function stopped working after a couple of months. Norelco sent me a new base but that one stopped working also. Also the top keeps coming loose from the body of the shaver. Certainly not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Steven D

customer_reviews.title: Very poor excuse for a razor
customer_reviews.text: I've used Norelco razors for almost 50 years. This one is by far the worst one I've owned. It does a horrible job dry shaving and is only marginally better at wet shaving. I took me twice as long to get a decent shave than the one I just had to discard because it quit. (I miss it a lot.) I discontinued use of the thing and bought a different razor. I could not recommend one of these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Bob

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for skin
customer_reviews.text: This is really only good as an absolute last resort. Every single thing they say about protecting skin is 100% false. If I shave with a straight razor, I have no irritation. With this I am left tons of small nicks that turn into pimples, and the razor burn IS REAL. I used it for like 4 months, then sharpened my razors, and now I haven't touched this electric razor since. It's really well made, but it can't solve the problem of being terrible for you skin (an issue since electric razors were invented lol)
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: what a piece of  junk
customer_reviews.text: i have been using norelco razors my entire life ... the last one lasted 10 years ... this one lasted 4 months .... they must be making them in china now ... the razor turns off now about every 20 seconds .... the battery runs down in about 5 shaves and it says that it has to be cleaned when i just cleaned it ... and it was very expensive ... boy do i wish i could get my money back ...
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pettet

customer_reviews.title: Norelco 9700 is a "Smart Clean Pro", but this special package contains a "Smart Clean unit" very cheaply
customer_reviews.text: The product comes in a free packaging, for me it was a brown box and without an instruction manual, but the Smart Clean unit that comes with Norelco 9700 is a "Smart Clean Pro", but this special package contains a "Smart Clean unit" very cheaply made without the ring, Though the Smart Clean system has its issues that I may live with but the cheap plastic construction "Made in China" does not justify the price paid. Also beware the picture given in the description is for a Smart Clean Pro with a illuminating Ring but the product I received is a Smart Clean unit that comes with 9300 series or lower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shaver. if your in the market for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shaver. if your in the market for a new one and want to treat yourself a little bit go for this model. the numeric battery charge indicator is more useful then you could imagine. the cleaning charging base and brush and great added features to a nice shaving system. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Solution needs to be replaced too often (every 3 weeks). A previous system I used in the past went longer. Was a mistake to buy this. I'm going back to blade. First I will start cleaning this with water and stop constantly buying cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.author: TX1

customer_reviews.title: Lack of performance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shaver in March and have been very dissatisfied with its performance. I have been using electric shavers for many years but never a Norelco. My chief complaint is that no matter how I try face is never completely shaven. I know it is probably past the warrantee expiration but I am returning the shaver so that you may examine it. I am back to using my previous electric shaver and although it is not new it shaves much better than the Norelco. Donald Seckendorf 23379 Mirabella Circle South Boca Raton, Fla. 33433 561-251-8540 donaldsevk@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer George

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this item at all
customer_reviews.text: The power cord to the Shaver does not work in the Cleaning System. After a 30 minute phone call with Shakay (of Amazon?) I was told to call Norelco themselves. Norelco Customer Service told me they had other phone calls in this regard. She told me to try to plug the cord into the Cleaning System "slanted", which she said one of their customers reported to work. WOW . . . Just WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Hornsby

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use it daily along and shave wet with lather soap. I also clean it daily and it feels new each day. 3 weeks so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using electronic razors for many years. Got this one six weeks ago: 1 It's Quiet operation is a plus 2 Shaving is a breeze (after the first week of adjustment to my facial hair) 3 Easy cleaning 4 Its has a percentage meter for battery life. Its seems to lose 4% to 6% after each shave so if you taking it out of town for more then 4 days bring the charging cord with you. Overall it's great however keep in mind replacing the head every year could be costly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim I

customer_reviews.title: Delivered a wrong Cleaning system
customer_reviews.text: The Norelco 9700 comes with a cleaning system that has a progress bar. The one I received did not have that. The cleaning system is of 9300. I am going to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas GS

customer_reviews.title: Shaver is okay but the smart clean pro w/illuminating ring that is advertised for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Shaver is okay but the smart clean pro w/illuminating ring that is advertised for this product was replaced with another cleaning/charging system. Other reviewers noted this issue but Amazon has not corrected the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: The best shaver I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I always have been using Philips shavers. In the previous machine they disappointed me when they "upgraded" the RQ12 replacement head to a new design and called it Pro or Plus but it was awful. I was afraid to buy the 9700 machine because I suspected that the head is like the new RQ12 head, but I took the risk and I'm happy that I bought that machine, Philips got my trust again. I have a sensitive skin and I feel great with that machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dudi Amar

customer_reviews.title: Non-Independently Moving Heads
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas to replace the independently moving heads off of his Norelco that we got, I'm guessing 10 years ago. He won't use this. I keep bugging him PLEASE use this as it was quite expensive. He won't. At least not yet. I can't return it as it is too late. There's nothing wrong with it except the heads do not move independently. I wish someone would have mentioned that before I bought it. OR if someone would tell me if I could switch the heads on this one to one that does.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M F

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Gosh
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, this is the greatest electric shaver that I have ever used. Seriously!!! I remember trying to use an electric shaver at different times of my life and they sucked, irritated the skin, just didn't like them. I decided to take a chance on this one even with it being expensive. Best decision I made, it's wonderful and gives me the shave I want. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: refurbished box selling me as new items!
customer_reviews.text: It’s alike a refurbished box , not a original packaging. The head part metal has been little damage missing a part as show in red circle. So it’s not a new item what I paying for new !
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: Smart clean is a knock off
customer_reviews.text: Smart clean device was some cheap knock off and not what you see in the picture . I couldn’t even charge it with the same charger as it’s probably some older model . Don’t waste your time trying to reason on the phone with amazon. They sent me back exactly the same garbage. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantinos C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Norelco I've ever owned and I've owned five of them very happy with this razor
customer_reviews.text: Been looking at this model for a long time my old Norelco was giving me fits so I decide to buy this one is the newest one very happy with it twice as good as my old one very comfortable to hold very comfortable shave and shave very close I'm glad I bought this razor
customer_reviews.author: ezekiel bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Another "designed to fail" Philips product
customer_reviews.text: SmartClean system failed after just a few uses. No longer pumps fluid to wash and lubricate the heads. Razor OK, but no better than many previous models. Upgrade not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roger1

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean or shave well
customer_reviews.text: The blades fail to last a year. The cleaning system does not clean head totally. This morning, during cleaning, there was a loud screech from the razor in the cleaning system. Finally, it leaves stubble intermittently. 2920-08-29 update - last Norelco I ever buy. Cleaning well died this last week. Razor developing screeching sound. After dying, expected within next two months, using another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: description
customer_reviews.text: it works great and very easy to use plus shaves better than most regular shavers plus it has a unit that you put in after your done to wash your shaving heads to keep them clean plus has a battery meter plus a charger to keep it charged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: may not be worth full price
customer_reviews.text: its a nice shaver however its really not that close of a shave like everyone says it is dry shave can sometime leave you with razor burns wet shave is perfect smooth and leaves no burns or skin irritation cleaning it is easy and fast battery life is not that good lose 7 to 10 percent on charge during a single shave
customer_reviews.author: Gavino

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Why do I get a clean base that is different from the picture?Those lights are different from the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: li xiaohan

customer_reviews.title: Hygienic electric razor
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning station is easy to use. Although it takes 4 hours to complete the cleaning and drying cycle, but it is appearently cleaner than using water only as less odour is found compare with my previous razor. However the face cleaning brush is disappointing since it’s basically a revolving giant toothbrush, it hurts skin and not cleaning skin well. The cleaning solution smells good when using with cleaning station yet it might spills if you accidentally tapped your cleaning station over.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst Phillips ever. Cut me two times with first shave. I have been using the Norelco products for over 20 years. This has never happened. Decided to try the prestige, if it does not work will try the Braun.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very pricey razor compared to most others.
customer_reviews.text: Razor fits well in the hand. Like the battery life readout. Don't like that the shaving head has to be removed and the beard/sideburn trimmer has to be attached. This feature was integrated on previous models that I owned. Also the shave so far has not been the greatest. Shaver does not do a very good job shaving the longer hairs on the neck. Older models have done a better job.
customer_reviews.author: David Barringer

customer_reviews.title: Closest shave I ever had except a barber's straight razor and even then this is little different.  Remarkable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shaver I have ever had. Simply remarkable. I thought it was too much money but worth every penny. Closer than most blades and cleaning and maintenance is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Virgil D. Medlin

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: The floating heads do shave under the jaw better than the cheaper models. Wish it had a trimmer on it. Too many models in their lineup, less choices and lower the cost.
customer_reviews.author: cds

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shaver ever
customer_reviews.text: Best electric shaver ever. i recently had to take blood thinners for a short period of time, and this was to avoid getting cut with a razor. As close to a razor shave as one could ever hope.
customer_reviews.author: jerome wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a gift for my boyfriend for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my boyfriend for Christmas. He charged it a full night and went to use it the next day. It would not turn on. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Guiza

customer_reviews.title: Capable of shaving as close as a razor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electronic shaver. It shaved as close as a traditional razor. The cleaning station is a great accessory. I shaved with a traditional razor for 34 years...it’s unlikely I’ll return to razors.
customer_reviews.author: G-Money

customer_reviews.title: Philips warranty
customer_reviews.text: After a few beards the motion sensor stopped working Philips says worldwise warranty but this is not correct I bought the device in the Amazon.com USA and now I'm in Brazil. Philips do Brasil says they replace it with a much lower shaver available here Philips USA says they can't do anything because the device is not in the USA I ask the guarantee is not worldwide I think I already paid a very high price and I don't have a good Philips device
customer_reviews.author: HAYDON MARINHO

customer_reviews.title: The power cord does not fit the cleansing device.
customer_reviews.text: The cleansing device is useless since the power coed will not fit it. Do not send me another one of these useless devices.
customer_reviews.author: ztonyl

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be better. I used it one time and returned it ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have an older version of Norelco shavers and decided to give the Braun series 9 a try. Being the most expensive shaver in the market, I thought it would be better. I used it one time and returned it the following day. For those who have sensitive skin and hair growing parallel to skin, it's not going to satisfy you. I decided to give another chance for the norelco again and it honestly surprised me with it's enhanced stronger performance and closer shave. Definitely recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Bassim

customer_reviews.title: Smart Clean system never worked, no worldwide warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have used Norelco/Philips shavers all my life. First time I bought smart clean which came with inefficient/unclear instructions. After several months I realized it was defected and never worked. I bought it in the USA and in Europe they did not accept the warranty and asked for more than the cost of the item itself. Very disappointed. hat to throw away the smart clean.
customer_reviews.author: AYSE BEZMEN

customer_reviews.title: SmartClean knock off received :(
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today. I wanted to mention that I too received the old style, Chinese made SmartClean unit. Hoping it will do a good job. Disappointed that Philip's and Amazon continue to show the newer SmartClean Pro in the product listing, but ship the old, cheaper unit.
customer_reviews.author: David Litz

customer_reviews.title: Misses a lot of hairs
customer_reviews.text: It misses so many hairs. Have to go over the same spot multiple times in order to get a clean shave. Braun has done a much better job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This remains my favorite gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this to surprise me. The shaver works flawlessly! BEST EVER! Cleaning system works well, too!
customer_reviews.author: RonMartin

customer_reviews.title: Owned many Norelco's but this is the closest shave I have ever had with an electric
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomic design, shaves very well, really like the digital readout for battery life left. Just hoping that the cleaning/charging base lasts. Only had about a month so too early to tell on that.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: This may be great for some men based on the reviews but, I had to return it. Didn't work as well as expected. Still left some stubble even after going over the same part of the face several times.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: This Philips Norelco Does A Terrific Job...
customer_reviews.text: I have two Norelco shavers and never disappointed in their performance. This shaver cuts closer with more ease and smoothness than any other shaver I ever had. You will be satisfied with the job well done by Philips. The only drawback would be the replacement cost of the blades, but still Norelco has my business in the furture.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Best automatic shaver
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver out there. Smart clean is very effective and easy to use. I highly recommend this product. Very fast delivery from Amazon also!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Aaron Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, versatile, gives a very clean shave
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my S.O. over Christmas, and boy, does he love it! This was such a great purchase, and it's definitely the best shaver he's ever had. His face is so smooth now that it's a little bit off-putting for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome product, it replaced a 12 year old norelco ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome product,it replaced a 12 year old norelco that was still running great,this thing is so smooth,closest shave ,light years ahead of my old one,love it,hope it last as long as my old one!will rate long term at alater date
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband for his birthday but when i opened it, I realized that the item was used before. Looking closely to the shaver and the other accessories, you can see the used parts. Didnt take pictures but returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Lau

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: One of the closest shaves I have had with greatest comfort while shaving. The options for speed, charge percentage and cleaning required are excellent add to this shaver. The flexible head makes shaving easier and requires less time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Close shave
customer_reviews.text: Few razor bumps able to shave wet or dry, still needed to use preshave lotion for comfortable dry shaving but all in all is working great.
customer_reviews.author: SSD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time i'm buying this product. Now for my dad who loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Oz Gilat

customer_reviews.title: One motor is not enough...puny!
customer_reviews.text: My older 955RX [two motors] is stronger, easier to use the sideburn trimmer, does not require many passes and is a much preferred razor. The newer one has too many gadgets to increase the sales price and I find them not really necessary to the function of shaving. Too much money and not enough satisfaction; we should go back to where it was not necessary to invent a better mouse trap...it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy and unsatisfied customer.

customer_reviews.title: Should make it clear it is not in retail packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Come in non-retail box. Not sure if refurbished. Cannot use as a gift. Shaver itself is good, the replacement head is expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Hubby’s Xmas gift! He loves it and keeps commenting about how smooth the shave is. His skin is super sensitive and he doesn’t seem to be getting the razor burn he usually gets with his razor and old electric razor. Bye bye regular razors!
customer_reviews.author: Honeybear

customer_reviews.title: It's the best electric shaver I have ever used to date
customer_reviews.text: It's light, charges super fast. I have sensitive skin, I have tried other electric shavers, they all made my skin itch. But not this bad boy. I am super happy I finally have a good shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Aminadav Feigenboum

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I had a older model ( years older), but this one is so much better. It's a closer shave in 1/2 the time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: best quality raisor I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality electric razor I've ever used. Very expensive but worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Senn

customer_reviews.title: No charger for the smartclean system, rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a charger cord for the smartclean system. When I called Norelco, they told me the shaver cord will fit the smartclean system, however it does not. NO WAY !
customer_reviews.author: Steven Peckham

customer_reviews.title: Like the shave and cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The shave is still great. The cleaner is very handy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Can’t do a clean shave
customer_reviews.text: can’t do a clean shave with this product !! Used it for a while !! Never gonna buy a philips shaver again!
customer_reviews.author: Buntz

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: shaves well but no use for the cleaner or brush. not necessary when water proof and can just rinse it easily.. dont like how you have to re-attach the trimmer when it should just be built-in and pop out. also pricey. but 5 stars anyways bc no other shaver better that ive found.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Very close shave and it cleans itself. I would recommend to almost anyone who shaves regularly. Very low maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For such an expensive product it doesn't work all that great. It's inconvenient that the blades don't just pop up on a hinge to clean the inside. Instead you have to pull off the entire blade. It is also super inconvenient that the trimmer is not attached to the shaver and you have to switch out the head.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Liao

customer_reviews.title: Coarse hair.
customer_reviews.text: The shaver does not cut beard that is coarse (has a large diameter. Worse purchase ever. It has been used once. It would not cut my father's beard. I bought it as a present. It was a major disappointment. Way too expensive for poor performance.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie-Lynn Collins

customer_reviews.title: They
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver I have ever owned and I always have purchased the best top of the line models. Super clean and comfortable shaves every time. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Mike427

customer_reviews.title: My son Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the older model 4 yrs ago at Costco. He was 18 at the time his first one . He has dark course hair. He loved it but was too rough and broke it during travel. I found this amazing deal on Amazon and ordered it for him for his birthday and he loves it.!! Awesome features!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ferch

customer_reviews.title: Being gentle on my skin!
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't had enough time with this shaver to evaluate it. I have shaved my whole adult life with a manual razor & shaving cream. I bought this shaver in the hopes it would be much easier on my old skin.....so far so good. I am 77 yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Consistent Close Shave
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. Quiet and consistent shave. Very easy to clean and the attachments are great!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Krupa

customer_reviews.title: Shaves close and fast
customer_reviews.text: Like everything fast lose shave and so easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: David  Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and effective daily shaver. Was a Braun customer for years but got tired of having yo replace parts & shavers. My very first shaver was a Norelco and now I’m pleased I chose this unit!
customer_reviews.author: PioChristian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaver
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well and I really like the self cleaning charging base. Definitely worth the money. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor
customer_reviews.text: However i cannot make the connection with the cleaning unit and the power cord.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Barton

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now and I have no complaints. I use this to shave my entire head and face every day. I've never had any issues and it's worth every penny I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre C. McMillian

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shaver is good machine. The cleaner left defective does not turn off automatically
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: triangle head two was fine but one was not working so i had to ...
customer_reviews.text: triangle head two was fine but one was not working so i had to go to ServiceCenter to fix it right a way. Just opened a box this was a brand new one, and heighest model of Philips. i felt terrible.
customer_reviews.author: MIN SUNG, HAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have always hated the process of shaving, yet I don't really like to have facial hair either. This shaver is a game changer so far. Makes the daily task of shaving quick, easy and performs a close shave. Glad I finally bit the bullet and spent the bucks to get it.
customer_reviews.author: chris broussard

customer_reviews.title: Great product, glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: The best shaver I ever had. Works fast, clean, shaves almost like a razor. And the ergonomics is great. Wonder if any significant progress may be made with this kind of shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Ofer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong power cable !!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before, so the shaver is as good as before. However, the included power cord will not fit the cleaning system. Nor will my cord from the previous system. Both fit the shaver fine. So the new cleaning system gets junked. Seems like a pretty big waste.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Strope

customer_reviews.title: Best electric razor out there
customer_reviews.text: Best electric razor out there. Even better than the 8900 it replaced. It is also much easier to keep clean, while providing a very close shave consistently even after 2 months of daily usage. The 9700 has reestablished my faith in the Norelco brand.
customer_reviews.author: William L.

customer_reviews.title: Not completely happy
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to clean and didn’t take the long hairs off my neck very well. It seems to be overpriced and too many options to change the head every time you want to do something different.
customer_reviews.author: sam f.

customer_reviews.title: best shaver ever
customer_reviews.text: best shaver ever, but I didnt undersand why not original box, cleaning statin for 9300 and where is Philps card((
customer_reviews.author: Davit

customer_reviews.title: packaging is not nice
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, but the packaging does not look very nice. So probably cannot be used as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: DZ_Boston

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning system's a little complicated but does a great job on the beard
customer_reviews.text: As a long-time Norelco user, I can say this is the best one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I kept my old shaver and it compares closely to the Philips 9700 for a 1/4 of the price. Not sure I would rush to buy this one unless you are in desperate need or it’s a really good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Norelco 9300, the best razor I’ve owned, after 6 months. The 9700 is slightly cheaper with minor upgrades. The blade mechanics are the same. Nevertheless, the 9700 doesn’t give me as close a shave although it’s still good.
customer_reviews.author: Plain truth

customer_reviews.title: The shavers cleaner charge holder fails in 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shaver for 1 year now and last week the pump motor failed and will no longer clean the shaver. I took it about and found the metal shaft that holds the impeller on pump motor had rusted off. Very disappointed for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: douglas braun

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Close
customer_reviews.text: Much more comfortable than my old Norelco SensoTouch 1280 (even with a fairly new head). The shaving results are much closer and smoother. Shaver is very quiet compared to my old Norelco. Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't cut whiskers very well, Iv'e been thinking of buying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Smartclean
customer_reviews.text: Power cable fit the shaver but not the Smartclean!! I ordered a replacement Smartclean they sent the same Smartclean that did not fit the cable!! I wanted the new unit that was illuminated on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: James L. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Stick with a name brand
customer_reviews.text: Best shaver I bought so far best shave I've gotten so far
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great razor!
customer_reviews.text: They say it takes 21 days to get a close shave. My first shave out of the box was really nice. I just got this so haven't had a chance to mess around with the attachments but I am happy with the shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Aravind K Moorthy

product_meta.title: Philips Norelco S9721/89 Shaver 9700 with SmartClean, Rechargeable Wet/Dry Electric Shaver with Cleansing Brush Attachment
product_meta.description: Style:Special Pack (Bonus Cleaning Brush) / FFPPhilips Norelco Shaver 9700 delivers a delivers superior closeness in a single pass, even on 3-day beards. With the unique Contour Detect Technology, each shaving head independently moves in 8 directions to follow your face's every curve. This improved contouring helps cut up to 20 percent more hair in a single pass. The newly designed V-Track Precision Blades collect hair in the optimal cutting position, resulting in a more comfortable shave that’s 30 percent closer. The SmartClean System allows for easy maintenance: cleans, lubricates, dries, and charges your shaver. Smart Click precision trimmer for precise facial hair grooming. Up to 60 minutes of cordless shaving per full charge Lithium-ion battery also fully charges in 1 hour. The premium interface puts you in control of your shaver's performance by displaying battery level percentage, cleaning indicator, battery low indicator, replacement head indicator, and a travel lock indicator. Facial cleansing brush attachment delivers a thoroughly deep clean in a more gentle, hygienic way. Ergonomic grip and handling. LED display indicates when it is time to recharge your shaver. Travel lock feature helps you avoid wasting battery life.
feature_bullets: Designed for a close shave in mind, Philips Norelco Shaver 9700 always delivers superior closeness in a single pass, even on 3 day beards.

Each shaving head independently moves in 8 directions to follow your face's every curve. This superior contouring helps capture up to 20 percent more hair while the shaving system cuts up to 30 percent closer.
Choose the speed setting that best fits your skin and hair type: Slow (for an even more skin friendly shave), Medium (for a thorough shave), and Fast (for a high powered shave).
Shave wherever and however you'd like. Facial cleansing brush attachment delivers a thoroughly deep clean while remaining gentle on the skin. The SmartClean System allows for easy shaver maintenance.
The rechargeable lithium ion battery delivers the power of a corded shaver without the hassle of a cord. 60 minutes of shaving time, with a digital interface that displays battery level percentage.
